Data: Sharma to Finch, 1 run short of a length, at the stumps, bunted into the leg side for one
Sharma to Smith, no run short of a length, at the stump, defended to leg
Sharma to Smith, no run slower ball, on off, he picks it and defends
Sharma to Smith, no run short of a length, at the stumps, worked to square leg
Sharma to Smith, no run slower ball, short of a length, and again he finds that square leg with that flick. With a normal field Smith would have got at least a couple of singles so far
Sharma to Smith, no run on a length, just outside off, defended watchfully
Kohli to Finch, no run full inswinger, pushed to short cover for a crowd catch
Kohli to Finch, no run length ball outside off, pushed with an open face to point
Kohli to Finch, 1 run full outside off, driven to long-off
Kohli to Smith, FOUR runs short this time, why are they feeding Smith? He loves it. Shuffles across, and pulls this through midwicket
Kohli to Smith, 1 run full toss outside off, driven to long-off for one
Kohli to Finch, 1 run short of a length, outside off, he goes back to open the face, takes a single to the right of short third man

Sharma to Finch, FOUR runs gentle-paced bouncer, only about chest high, and Finch has pulled this powerfully between deep backward square and deep midwicket. This will give Finch some confidence after a tentative start
Sharma to Finch, 1 run short of a length, into the pads, works it fine of square leg for one
Sharma to Smith, 1 run moves inside the line of a shortish delivery, gets a single to long leg
Sharma to Finch, no run slower ball, on off, defended
Sharma to Finch, no run on a length, angling in, defended to leg
Sharma to Finch, 1 leg bye missed put. This is down leg and a length ball. On another day Finch glances this for four eyes closed. Today he has not been at his best, and gets just one leg-bye
Jadeja to Finch, no run on a length, middle and leg, defended around the front pad
Jadeja to Finch, no run hits him pad but this is headed well down leg
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run moral victory for Jadeja as he has already made Finch take big risk. he backs away early, and cuts this from in front of the stumps for a single
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run down the wicket, right to its pitch, drives it to long-on for one
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run tossed up outside off, driven to the left of cover, and they get a single despite Rahane's dive here
Jadeja to Smith, 3 runs down the wicket again, what looks like an on-drive for one ends up being a whip through midwicket as his wrists come into play at the last moment
Sharma to Smith, 1 run short of a length, on off, he has somehow managed to place it wide of mid-on for one
Sharma to Finch, 1 run short of a length, wide, punched away to deep point for one
Sharma to Smith, no run on a length, just outside off, defended off the back foot
Sharma to Smith, 1 run on a length, outside off, opens the face late, gets a single to deep cover
Sharma to Finch, 1 run slower ball, short, punched away powerfully to deep cover
Sharma to Smith, 1 run punched away to deep cover again
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run stays back to a length ball and punches this to deep cover
Jadeja to Finch, FOUR runs tossed up wide, he sets up a solid base, and smacks this drive powerfully through cover. This is bludgeoned. No niceties about it
Jadeja to Finch, no run this is middle and leg, doesn't turn, hits the inside half of the bat
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run overpitched, driven to long-on for one
Jadeja to Smith, no run on a length, holds its line, defended back to him
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run short of a length, punched away to deep point for one more
Sharma to Smith, 2 runs short of a length, punched away slightly to the right of third man where Shami's arm is taken on, and a couple secured
Sharma to Smith, no run slower ball, full, on off, defended from the crease
Sharma to Smith, no run full, on off, hits the inside half of the bat somehow
Sharma to Smith, 1 run short of a length, middle and leg, worked away for a single
Sharma to Finch, FOUR runs slower ball but if you bowl them so often, the short and wide delivery counts as a rank poor ball. Cut away in front of point for four
Sharma to Finch, no run on a length, just outside off, defended to cover
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run tossed up wide outside off, driven to long-on for one
Ashwin to Finch, no run wide half-volley, he plays for the non-existent turn, hits it off the outside half of the bat, to point
Ashwin to Finch, no run nice dip as he goes slower through the air. Defended off the front foot
Ashwin to Finch, no run short of a length, he goes back to cut, Ahswin is lucky he has found the fielder
Ashwin to Finch, 1 run this one turns back in to cramp him up, punched down to long-off for one
Ashwin to Smith, no run nicely tossed up wide outside off, some drift, some dip, creates the bat-pad gap, draws an inside edge, but he is safe
Jadeja to Finch, no run tossed up, middle and leg, defended back to Jadeja
Jadeja to Smith, no run defended back to him
Jadeja to Smith, no run defended back to him as he bowls fast and straight
Jadeja to Smith, no run Kohli at short straight cover saves one with his dive. Dhoni likes this better than he did Rohit at short straight midwicket
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run clipped away off the pads to bring up yet another fifty against India. Smith loves them. They don't him. Fair to say
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run down the wicket, to the pitch of the ball, drives it to long-on
Ashwin to Finch, no run some dip from Ashwin, defended back to him
Ashwin to Finch, no run big slog sweep attempted, is beaten, but the bounce is taking this over. hence the muted lbw shout
Ashwin to Finch, 3 leg byes leg spin almost in business. Short of a length, into the pads, goes back to whip it behind square, goes fine of that leg spin. Too fast for the man
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run short of a length, cut away, Ashwin is lucky Rohit makes the diving save at cover-point. Has saved three runs. Smith not happy he has not placed this perfectly
Ashwin to Finch, no run flighted around off, dips too, defended back to him
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run down the wicket again, right to its pitch, pushes this to long-on for one
Jadeja to Finch, no run stays back to a length ball, punches it to cover
Jadeja to Finch, no run stays back again as Jadeja pitches this up again. Can't do much with it
Jadeja to Finch, no run stays back again, Jadeja bowls length, he dabs on it, but can't beat short third man
Jadeja to Finch, no run flatter, into the pads, defended
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run full, overpitched, finally plays down the ground and gets a single to long-on
Ashwin to Finch, no run flat delivery, arm ball, punched to point
Ashwin to Finch, no run slower through the air, regulation offbreak, defended to leg

Ashwin to Finch, FOUR runs too short. This will release the pressure. The story of India's summer against Australia. They created pressure during the Tests too, but would release it with a bad ball. This is a bad ball. Short and wide, and is cut away for four
Ashwin to Finch, no run short again, the turn this time means he hasn't placed it well. Straight to cover-point
Ashwin to Finch, 2 runs short of a length, turning into the pads, bunted into the leg side, and takes on Mohit Sharma's arm at deep backward square. Takes the second
Ashwin to Finch, 1 run nudges this offbreak around the corner for one
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run on a length, on the pads, dropped into the leg side for a single that takes the partnership to 100
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run punched down to long-on as he pitches short of a length
Jadeja to Finch, no run flat length ball, defended to leg

Jadeja to Finch, no run huge lbw shout, given not out, but Dhoni has gone against his instinct to review this. Finch is sweeping, is beaten, and the umpire reckons he is outside the line of off. Dhoni thinks the same too, but Jadeja is persistent that he has hit him in the line. Dhoni asks him where he hit him on the pad. Jadeja says the inside part
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run defended to leg for a single
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run driven down to long-on for one

Ashwin to Smith, 3 runs lovely shot. Ashwin bowls a wide full ball, an offbreak designed to draw his bat away from the body, but he uses the wrists well to keep this drive down. Against the spin it goes, past the cover
Ashwin to Finch, 1 run pushed to long-on for one
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run pushed to long-on for another single
Ashwin to Finch, no run tossed up, slight dip, draws a defensive shot
Ashwin to Finch, 1 run short of a length, worked around the corner for one
Ashwin to Smith, no run tossed up outside off, pushed to cover
Jadeja to Finch, no run full, middle and leg, pushed to short midwicket
Jadeja to Finch, no run appeal for bat-pad catch, but this has lobbed off the flap of the pad. No bat involved
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run pushed to long-on

Jadeja to Smith, SIX runs Smith has manufactured the length here. Sees the flat delivery early, this is not short, just short of a length, but he has gone deep into the crease to convert this into a short ball, and he pulled it with a vertical bat over midwicket. Excellent batting
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run and now he pushes one down the ground for one
Jadeja to Finch, no run this time he gets an inside edge onto the pad, but this has fallen wide of Dhoni
Ashwin to Smith, no run offbreak just outside off, defended with an open face
Ashwin to Smith, no run nice dip on this offbreak, he ends up pushing this to short straight midwicket

Ashwin to Smith, no run he has driven this into the stumps at the non-striker's end, and India are appealing for a run-out. First things first. Ashwin does get a touch on it as he dives, but Finch is alert. He is holding the bat in his left hand, and has gone back immediately as he sees a straight drive from Smith
Ashwin to Smith, no run short of a length, punched away to cover
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run driven to long-on for one

Ashwin to Finch, 2 runs swept away from middle and leg, awkward slide from Mohit at long leg. A chunk of turn comes off as he slides vertically straight into the ground. Lucky he hasn't done any damage to himself
Jadeja to Smith, no run flat length ball, he stays back and punches, and finds cover-point
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run down the wicket to drive this to long-off for one
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run tossed up outside off, he presses forward to push this to deep cover to bring up a subdued fifty. A solid effort nonetheless. Full of character
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run driven down to long-off for one
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run overpitched on the pads, worked to long leg for one
Jadeja to Smith, FOUR runs lovely shot. A Mark Waugh shot without that elegance. Down the wicket, chips this over midwicket. Easy does it
Ashwin to Finch, 2 runs tossed up, middle and leg, clipped away in the gap deep on the leg side. Rushes back for the second
Ashwin to Finch, 1 run swept away this time, but straight to deep midwicket, gets just the single
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run punches this down to long-on as Ashwin bowls flat
Ashwin to Finch, no run full, just outside off, turning in, defended off the front foot
Ashwin to Finch, no run some turn again, into the pads, he deflects it behind square, but finds short fine leg
Ashwin to Finch, no run Ahswin bowls shortish and flat, he goes back to cut, and is disgusted with himself at not finding the gap
Sharma to Smith, no run short of a length, outside off, a little extra bounce, beats his punch
Sharma to Smith, no run short of a length, just outside off, punched to cover
Sharma to Smith, 2 runs down the wicket, drives this length ball in front of deep cover for two
Sharma to Smith, 1 run length ball, on the pads, chipped away to deep midwicket for one
Sharma to Finch, 1 run short of a length, into the body, punched to the right of midwicket for one
Sharma to Smith, 2 runs short, waist high, pulled between deep backward square and deep midwicket for two
Ashwin to Finch, no run tossed up, middle and off, pushed to short straight midwicket
Ashwin to Finch, 1 run swept away hard, takes a single to deep backward square
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run down the wicket to push this to deep midwicket
Ashwin to Finch, no run full, middle and off, pushed to short straight midwicket
Ashwin to Finch, no run short of a length, worked around the corner, but not wide of backward square leg
Ashwin to Finch, no run slower through the air, flighted around off, defended back to him
Sharma to Smith, FOUR runs short of a length, straight, punched down the ground, straight of mid-on. A good start to the last 20 overs for Australia
Sharma to Smith, no run short of a length, on off, punched to cover
Sharma to Smith, 1 run slower ball, short of a length, outside off, punched to deep cover

Sharma to Finch, no run that's close. Big shout for lbw. Short of a length, nips back in, hits just above the knee roll. It is hitting the stumps, but the impact seems outside off. Replays show umpire's call on impact and also that is only clipping the top of the stumps
Sharma to Finch, no run full, low full toss, worked to midwicket
Sharma to Finch, 1 run short of a length, outside off, dabbed away to third man for one
Ashwin to Finch, 1 run full, swept away from just outside off, gets a single to deep backward square
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run down the wicket to drive this to long-on for one
Ashwin to Finch, 2 runs reverse sweep with no third man in place. Gets a couple
Ashwin to Finch, 2 runs makes room to cut this from outside leg, Rohit Sharma misfields at point
Ashwin to Finch, no run reverse-sweeps, is beaten, but is hit outside the line of off
Ashwin to Finch, no run cuts from the line of leg again, but finds cover
Shami to Smith, no run short of a length, wide, punched away, but can't beat the man at backward point
Shami to Smith, no run short of a length, angling in to off, pushed back to the bowler
Shami to Smith, FOUR runs low full toss, Smith shuffles across, plays with a closed face, beats short fine leg. For a moment Shami thinks lbw is in business
Shami to Smith, no run short of a length, wide, beats the punch
Shami to Smith, SIX runs length ball, angling in, he clears the front leg, and slogs this over midwicket for a six. Smith is slowly hitting that next gear

Shami to Smith, FOUR runs and there is the hundred. Poor bowling. Short ball, waist high. Bouncers get wickets. Just short balls don't. He drags this pull from outside off, beats short fine leg. Removes the helmet. Celebrates the hundreds. Keeps in with the tradition of Aussie Nos 3 standing up tall in big matches

Sharma to Finch, SIX runs India continue bowling short with no meanness or intent behind the balls. Finch makes room, upper-cuts it, and sends it over point for six. This could just be the turning point in this Finch innings
Sharma to Finch, 1 run low full toss, driven to midwicket for one
Sharma to Smith, no run makes room but drives this full toss straight to extra cover. Misses out

Sharma to Smith, FOUR runs slower ball. Matters nowt. He has picked this early, opens the hip by clearing the front leg, and lofts this back over the bowler's head. The move-on is on. Too early to call a Smith double hundred?
Sharma to Smith, 1 run short of a length, into the body, worked away for a single
Sharma to Finch, FOUR runs low full toss, Finch gets inside its line, and provides it a ramp with his bat to launch it over short fine leg for four

Yadav to Smith, OUT India get the breakthrough. Smith won't score a double. Yadav bowls a bouncer that finally gets head high. Smith clears the front leg to hook. Doesn't control it. The top edge settles with deep square leg. Smith raises his bat to the crowd as he walks off
Yadav to Finch, 1 wide wide down the leg side. A rib-high short ball
Yadav to Finch, 1 wide wide down leg again as Yadav looks to tuck him up but misfires
Yadav to Finch, 1 leg bye angling in, beats the inside edge, concedes a leg-bye
Yadav to Maxwell, FOUR runs four first ball for Maxwell. Length ball, into the pads, flicked away, square of fine leg. Easy pickings first up
Yadav to Maxwell, 1 wide wide down leg again. Yadav is trying to deny them room, but is bowling only down leg
Yadav to Maxwell, no run on a length, just outside off, defended to cover
Yadav to Maxwell, no run short of a length, wide, cut away to point
Yadav to Maxwell, 1 run on a length, angling in towards off, plays this with soft hands, drops it towards cover, rushes through for one
Shami to Maxwell, 2 runs Maxwell makes room, Shami bounces him, Maxwell tries to cut this down the ground (yes), and gets a top edge over the keeper's head
Shami to Maxwell, 1 run slower ball, short of a length, runs this down to third man
Shami to Finch, FOUR runs short of a length, at the hips, nicely glanced fine of fine leg. Yadav clumsy with the dive there. Ordinary ball, ordinary fielding
Shami to Finch, 1 run low full toss, drilled back at him, he gets a touch to it, but the deflection to midwicket yields a single
Shami to Maxwell, 1 run short ball, rib high, pulled away. Lucky to get away with it. Lucky it has gone straight to long leg
Shami to Finch, 1 run short again, rib high again, helped away for a single

Yadav to Finch, 1 leg bye big lbw shout as he plays across the line. The way Finch runs he is looking guilty. Kettleborough gets it right again. This is bouncing over. Finch, though, can be run out, but Raina misses from short cover
Yadav to Maxwell, FOUR runs just a little short of a length, and Maxwell pulls this Ponting-style for four through long leg. Just helped along the way
Yadav to Maxwell, SIX runs oh more Ponting evoked here. This is an ordinary short ball, and he sets up the base to go back and pull this over midwicket for six
Yadav to Maxwell, no run yorker outside off, dug out to mid-off
Yadav to Maxwell, FOUR runs slower ball, but Maxwell picks it and backs away to drill it back over Yadav's head for four. This is pummelled. Absolutely pummelled
Yadav to Maxwell, no run low full toss, makes room to slice it, but straight to Rahane at cover-point
Ashwin to Finch, 1 run length ball, offbreak, bunted to leg for one
Ashwin to Maxwell, no run slow through the air, well bowled. Dips a little. Maxwell is cramped by the turn. Defended back to him

Ashwin to Maxwell, OUT Ashwin has bowled well, and he has got the big Maxwell wicket. Good field placings, good courage to bowl slow through the air. The ball turns into the pads, he cannot play it through the off side, and doesn't bother keeping the sweep down. Straight down the lap of deep backward square it goes
Ashwin to Finch, no run tossed up, middle and leg, worked ton short fine leg
Ashwin to Finch, no run flat, short of a length, punched, but can't beat point
Ashwin to Finch, 1 run flat, into the pads, worked away square for one
Yadav to Finch, no run short, outside off, short-arm pulled to midwicket

Yadav to Finch, OUT good sharp short ball. India are clawing back. They could still keep Australia down to a manageable total. Only Yadav has been able to hurry the batsmen with the short ball. Finch is hurried into this again. This is just outside off, chest high, and does him for the pace. The edge is taken, and caught at midwicket. A hard-working
Yadav to Clarke, 1 run pulled away for one to deep backward square leg
Yadav to Watson, no run short of a length, just outside off, pushed to cover off the back foot
Yadav to Watson, 1 wide wide down the leg side. Kettleborough not affected by the appeal for the catch
Yadav to Watson, no run forward-defensive as he pitches on a length
Yadav to Watson, no run short of a length, on off, defended back to him
Jadeja to Clarke, 1 run short of a length, flat, straight, worked away for a single around the corner
Jadeja to Watson, 1 run full, into the pads, driven to long-on for one
Jadeja to Clarke, 1 run tossed up on off, driven to long-off for one
Jadeja to Watson, 1 run flat, short of a length, punched down to long-off for one
Jadeja to Clarke, no run shimmies down the wicket, Jadeja slows it down a little, Clarke defends to leg
Jadeja to Clarke, no run another shimmy, and another forward-defensive
Shami to Faulkner, 1 run short of a length, straight, worked to leg for one
Shami to Watson, 3 runs slower length ball, Watson has picked the field well with no sweeper back on the off side, and he makes room to go over cover. Not the best connection, but clears the infield
Shami to Faulkner, FOUR runs that's lucky runs for Faulkner. Good bouncer from Shami, gets it shoulder high, Faulkner looks to drag it from outside off, gets a top edge over the keeper's head
Shami to Faulkner, FOUR runs this short ball is not that great. A bit tired really. This is only chest high, and he has pulled this between deep backward square and long leg
Shami to Faulkner, 1 bye makes room, Shami follows him up with the endangered species - the yorker. Just the single off the inside edge
Shami to Watson, no run another yorker, tailing back in, following him, kept out by Watson, but the desired result for India: a dot ball
Jadeja to Faulkner, SIX runs Faulkner the finisher. Faulkner the party pooper. Slog-sweeps this flat over midwicket for six. Hits the gloves that are left to dry there
Jadeja to Faulkner, 1 run makes room to expose the cover field as India strengthen the leg-side field. Raina, though, makes a diving save at cover to save three runs
Jadeja to Watson, no run Watson looks for a slog sweep this time, gets an inside edge into his back pad. Credit Jadeja for pulling the length back
Jadeja to Watson, no run bowls a round-arm fast ball outside off, hurries Watson up. Another dot
Jadeja to Watson, no run clever bowling. Sees Watson backing away, and fires in a wide yorker. Well bowled
Jadeja to Watson, 1 run another flat fast delivery wide outside off, this time Watson drives it to deep cover for one
Shami to Watson, 1 run square-drive a wide length ball, Jadeja dives to his wrong side at point to save three runs
Shami to Clarke, no run bouncer, good bouncer, higher than the shoulder, Clarke pulls out of the pull
Shami to Clarke, 1 run short of a length, on off, runs this down to third man for one
Shami to Watson, no run wide length ball, he stays back to cut, but finds the man at point
Shami to Watson, no run bouncer again, and again he gets it higher than the shoulder. He withdraws from the pull. Two good bouncers this over
Shami to Watson, no run half-volley outside off, crunched away, but straight to mid-off
Jadeja to Clarke, FOUR runs and there is the boundary. A length ball, fired into the pads, he uses all the pace of the ball, and chips it over midwicket for four
Jadeja to Clarke, no run slower through the air as Clarke shimmies, gets some turn, draws a defensive shot
Jadeja to Clarke, 1 run fired into the pads, this time he has a fielder on the boundary in front of square on the leg side. Gives away just the single
Jadeja to Watson, no run flat and straight, no room, pushed to cover
Jadeja to Watson, 1 run makes room to punch this length ball to long-off for one
Jadeja to Clarke, 1 run length ball, into the pads, dropped into the leg side for one
Yadav to Watson, 1 run nails this punch to deep midwicket. Gets a single
Yadav to Faulkner, FOUR runs full, just short of the yorker length, and he has slogged this straight of deep midwicket. Amazing how he keeps missing the fielders

Yadav to Faulkner, OUT Faulkner goes after that cameo. Yadav bowls full and straight. Fuller than a length ball, just short of a yorker. Faulkner swings across the line to go over the leg side. Misses it altogether as it tails back in. Timbah
Yadav to Haddin, no run lovely yorker as Haddin makes room. Right on the crease. Dug out by Haddin, but that is a perfect delivery
Yadav to Haddin, no run short of a length, quick, no room, 143ks still, Haddin is making room but is cramped
Yadav to Haddin, FOUR runs Haddin is usually stylish down the ground, but this is just power. No elegance, just effectiveness. Makes room to drill this full ball straight of mid-on
Sharma to Watson, FOUR runs makes room to drive a length ball wide of cover for four. The worst ball to bowl at this stage is length
Sharma to Watson, 2 runs slower ball, has him there, Watson has to check that slog, but the top edge somehow clears square leg. Lucky for Watson
Sharma to Watson, FOUR runs short ball, but not the Yadav variety. Easy to pull this as there is hardly any nasty pace behind this. Pulls this wide of deep midwicket. Now he reaches a run a ball
Sharma to Watson, no run well bowled. A yorker outside off as he sees him back away. Dug out to point

Sharma to Watson, OUT slower ball, in his slot, this time he has picked the slower ball, but he has cramped him for room, and his slog settles with deep square leg. Just can't get enough power behind this shot because there is no rook available
Sharma to Haddin, 1 run slower ball, Haddin reads it late, but opens the face to get a single to short third man

Sharma to Clarke, OUT another wicket for India. This is a soft dismissal. A little luck for them. This is a short ball. Not a bouncer. No menace behind this. Only waist high. Clarke can see a four over midwicket, but just doesn't get the elevation he desires. Finds Rohit Sharma there. This is what a break in momentum does to you. Slight uncertainty,
Sharma to Faulkner, no run short of a length, on off, punched to extra cover
Sharma to Faulkner, no run short of a length, no room, has hit the bat as opposed to the bat hitting the ball. Heavy ball. Hits the shoulder of the bat as he defends
Sharma to Faulkner, 1 run on a length, tails in towards off, pushed to mid-on for one
Sharma to Watson, 1 run low swinging full toss, clipped to deep midwicket for one
Sharma to Faulkner, no run short of a length, pretty straight, defended to leg
Ashwin to Watson, no run on a length, no room, he defends to short midwicket
Ashwin to Watson, no run down the wicket, beaten in the flight as this dips on him, flicked to that midwicket again
Ashwin to Watson, no run flatter, quicker, pushed to cover. No run again. Pressure. Excellent from India
Ashwin to Watson, 2 runs down the wicket, not to its pitch again, drives this wide of long-off for two
Ashwin to Watson, no run looks for the big hit down the ground, but Ashwin is bold, slower through the air, getting the ball to dip, creating the gap between its pitch and Watson's reach. Defends

Ashwin to Watson, SIX runs and there is the Watson slog sweep. This can get his innings going. Finally Ashwin goes flatter. Possibly to protect a good over. Watson likes it that he has pitched it within his reach. Sends it sailing over midwicket
Shami to Haddin, no run this is in the slot. Half-volley outside off. Haddin has mis-hit this. Another dot. Straight to mid-off

Shami to Haddin, 1 run that mid-off nearly takes a catch. Haddin mis-hits a full ball again, but it bounces just short of mid-off. The single takes them to the first-ever 300 in a World Cup semi-final. Will we see another later this evening?
Shami to Johnson, FOUR runs but he is not bowling to his field. The field is there for the short ball, but he bowls length, and Johnson carts him over wide mid-on for four first ball

Shami to Johnson, FOUR runs he bowls short, according to his field, but Johnson has made room to pay an exceptional shot. He has punched this over wide mid-off. Yadav chases well, but inn the end the slide is clumsy, and Johnson gets four
Shami to Johnson, FOUR runs now that the third man comes in and mid-off goes back, Shami bowls the shortest ball of the over, and Johnson's top edge clears short third man
Shami to Johnson, 1 run yorker, middle and leg, but Johnson has dug it out for one
Sharma to Johnson, 2 runs slower ball, on a length outside off, he mis-hits it, but the bunt goes into the on side with no man inside the circle. Gets a couple
Sharma to Johnson, 1 run another slower ball, this time he has hit it harder towards deep midwicket. Won't get the second
Sharma to Haddin, 1 run another slower ball, hit towards deep midwicket, Kohli charges in, gets both hands to it, but drops it. Warner seen clapping that from the balcony
Sharma to Johnson, FOUR runs full toss with mid-off up not the best ball to bowl. Has missed the yorker in all likelihood. Drilled over mid-off for four
Sharma to Johnson, SIX runs this was telegraphed. Johnson was expecting the slower ball, and he has drilled it flat, and between long-on and deep midwicket. Flat six to cow corner
Sharma to Johnson, 1 run short of a length, at the body, no room, they get just a single

Around Smith, today, Finch battled hard, and once a collapse set in around the 35th over, Watson, Faulkner and Johnson played important little hands to help them over 300. This is the first time this World Cup that India haven't bowled out an opposition. They will need to carry all the confidence and the momentum from having held Australia back if they are

Ever since India set foot in Australia in November, Smith has scored 921 international runs against them in 10 innings. His lowest against them has been 14 while going for quick second-innings runs on a slow, unyielding pitch in Melbourne

6.14pm India have done really well in the end to drag Australia back from the time they looked like getting anything upwards of 350-360. A sobering thought about the new fielding restrictions and the modern bats: despite an overall excellent display in the end, India still conceded 89 in the last 10

G'day, folks. Looks like Australia have done what they do. Are we going to need a collective ECG at the SCG? Do India have a Grant Elliott? Can Mitchell Starc make these questions academic inside the Powerplay? We'll find out shortly. For India fans, here's a flashback to 2012 and the scintillating, successful chase against Sri Lanka in Hobart - only 321 b
Rohit Sharma is marking his guard, Mitchell Starc is at the top of his mark... Let's play white-ball cricket!
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run super start from Starc, not full enough to drive and nibbling back from outside off stump, beats an expansive drive from Rohit
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run good carry for Mitch 2.0, climbing off a length in the channel, Rohit draws his bat inside the line
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run probing away around off stump, fast and bouncy from Starc, defended sharply off the back foot

Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run full now, driven without foot movement - and taken. Or is it? There's a question of whether this carried, Watson did not seem all that sure at slip. Big edge from Sharma, only just after the ball had pitched, which confused things a touch... Erasmus is checking various replays, looks like there's some grass involved. For
Starc to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs pitched up again, in the slot and this time Rohit spears it through point, in the air for a moment but beat the fielder
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run length and sliding across, squares the batsman up and takes the edge again, bounces short of Clarke at second slip this time
Hazlewood to S Dhawan, 1 run slightly short, not quite the width Dhawan wanted but he still gets a firm cut away, well fielded at backward point, taking the pace off it and they amble one
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run length ball in the channel, 140kph and holding its line just a tad, Rohit shoulders arms
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run very tight to off stump but Rohit is confident he knows his geometry and leaves again
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run goodish length, angled in and blocked over the top of off stump

Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs fluffs the pull but this flies beyond Haddin scampering away to his left... Got hurried by the short ball and gloved wide of the wicketkeeper, just enough on it and they pick up two
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run too straight but Rohit misses with a flick to leg, thuds into the pads and drops down on to the pitch
Starc to S Dhawan, no run slightly full outside off, Dhawan pushes at it from the crease, gets an inside edge on to his pads
Starc to S Dhawan, 1 leg bye fired in on the stumps, quite full and tailing towards leg, Dhawan tucks it away behind square
Starc to Rohit Sharma, 1 run lets this go early, low full toss from Starc, which Rohit slashes down to third man
Starc to S Dhawan, no run on a length and homing on off stump, comes forward and taps into the off side

Starc to S Dhawan, no run Starc is revving at 150kph, steaming in and wanging the ball down around off, blocked back to the bowler, who picks up and attempts to look menacing... But Starc is a big ole puppy dog, we all know that
Starc to S Dhawan, no run strays on to the pads, flicked firmly but straight to Maxwell at square leg
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run good length in the channel, comes forward and plays into the ground towards cover point
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, 1 run touch short and seaming back at Rohit, works it off his body and into the gap between midwicket and mid-on
Hazlewood to S Dhawan, FOUR runs banged in short, in the arc and Dhawan dispatches it through midwicket, went off the middle like a rubber ball

Hazlewood to S Dhawan, no run edged and dropped by the diving Brad Haddin! Dhawan had skipped down the track, playing on the up and a big edge flew between keeper and slip, Haddin made the choice to fly after it, got both hands to the ball but was unable to cling on
Hazlewood to S Dhawan, 1 run touch short and wide and Dhawan slashes a toe-ended cut down to point
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run tighter line and dug in short as Sharma moves across and plays no stroke
Starc to S Dhawan, 1 run length delivery around off, comes forward and taps into a gap in the covers
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length outside off, no stroke
Starc to Rohit Sharma, 3 runs shortish and whipped away through midwicket, big roars go up around the ground as they scamper three
Starc to S Dhawan, no run very short and climbing high over the batsman, might have been lucky to get away with that one

Starc to S Dhawan, 1 leg bye now goes for the yorker, veers in dangerously late and tonks Dhawan on the boot, Dharmasena shakes his head at the lbw appeal... and then an attempt at a run out from point gifts India an overthrow. Australia think about the review but pass
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run short ball and left alone once again
Hazlewood to S Dhawan, 1 run slightly back of a length in the channel and Dhawan stays back, runs one to third man

Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, 1 leg bye shortish and ducking back at Sharma, hit on the padding and they hustle one, as Hazlewood tries to get to the ball in his follow through. The umpire comes in quickly to break up any potential afters
Hazlewood to S Dhawan, no run in the corridor, where Dhawan is known to go knocking on doors, swish and a miss from the moustachioed maestro
Hazlewood to S Dhawan, no run shortish, 142kph and stabbed into the off side form the crease
Hazlewood to S Dhawan, no run length around the line of off, half forward and takes a leading edge, falls short on the off side
Hazlewood to S Dhawan, 2 runs pitched up a little further, Dhawan uses those dancing feet, spikes a couple more into a gap through the covers
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, no run slung down in the channel, sliding across outside off like a shark in the shallows, left alone

Johnson to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs banged in and rising at the batsman's head, Rohit meets fire with TNT and hooks Johnson for six well over fine leg! No problems with that short ball, saw it early and scooped it into the crowd
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, no run length ball around off, goes across and defends down on to the pitch
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, no run in the channel, shuffles across to cover the line
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, no run length ball, around off stump, tries to drive on the up, bat turns in his hands and mid-off comes across to cut it off
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, no run up towards 150kph from Johnson, grooving his action, Rohit dabs to the off side - just the one scoring shot off the over but it was a goodie
Hazlewood to S Dhawan, no run fired across the bows, played down gently
Hazlewood to S Dhawan, 1 run dug in short and pulled away, wide of fine leg but it went quickly and they only manage a single
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, 1 run coming back in and Rohit plays with the angle to the leg side, another single
Hazlewood to S Dhawan, 1 run length delivery outside the line of off, opens the face and runs the ball away behind point
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run Hazlewood continues to plug away in the channel, diligent stuff, Rohit dabs it towards point
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run tight line around the off stump, hinting at a touch of seam movement in, Rohit shows it a solid front-foot block
Johnson to S Dhawan, 2 runs Johnson is going around the wicket, Dhawan backs away and steers a length ball through the covers for a couple, nicely timed
Johnson to S Dhawan, no run hammers in and hits the middle of the pitch, Dhawan stays back and guides in front of point

Johnson to S Dhawan, FOUR runs silky from Dhawan, he's more than happy to let Johnson fire the ball across him, lovely hands as he slices the ball elegantly between two fielders, four to the deep point boundary
Johnson to S Dhawan, no run goes back over the wicket, very full, not quite the yorker but swinging late, takes Dhawan on the pads
Johnson to S Dhawan, no run pitched up and tailing in, punched back to the bowler as he comes forward
Johnson to S Dhawan, no run goes across his stumps and blocks a length delivery
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, (no ball) length around off stump, defended... but Jimmy F has overstepped
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run pitched up, Rohit shapes to smash a home run, bottom edges one through backward square leg
Faulkner to S Dhawan, no run advances to a length ball and plays and misses... steady
Faulkner to S Dhawan, FOUR runs length delivery outside off, Dhawan walks out and larrups four through the covers, confidence of the man and that whistles away
Faulkner to S Dhawan, FOUR runs fuller, becomes a half-volley to Dhawan and he punches wide of the diving mid-foff, that's going to the rope too

Faulkner to S Dhawan, SIX runs too straight, innocuous pace from Faulkner, picked up and deposited into the stands! Dhawan has taken a liking to Faulkner, whips this waaaaaaayyyyyy over deep midwicket
Faulkner to S Dhawan, no run drags this wide of the stumps, comes forward and dabs the ball square, this time it's reeled in
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run pitched up across the right-hander, who punches through the covers
Johnson to S Dhawan, 2 runs fullish length, Dhawan moves on to off stump and clubs the ball through square
Johnson to S Dhawan, no run outside the line, goes across and plays into the covers
Johnson to S Dhawan, no run ripping bumper from Johnson, not all that short but it flew through at throat height outside off, Dhawan drops the bat in time
Johnson to S Dhawan, 1 wide slings this down the leg side... wide
Johnson to S Dhawan, 1 leg bye veering towards leg stump again, 147kph and thumps the padding as Dhawan attempts to flick to leg
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, no run good length around the line of off, Rohit seems to have all the time in the world as he leans out to defend
Faulkner to S Dhawan, FOUR runs four! Driven through the line, too full from Faulkner and pinged back whence it came, bowler got a finger to it but there was no stopping the ball
Faulkner to S Dhawan, 1 wide goes short, good rising delivery that cramps Dhawan as he hooks and misses... but was too leg side for Kettleborough's liking
Faulkner to S Dhawan, FOUR runs another four down the ground, Dhawan is on a Faulkner hunt! Charges at the bowler and rattles a short-arm jab fine of mid-on this time
Faulkner to S Dhawan, no run good length outside off, this time Dhawan elects to let it go
Faulkner to S Dhawan, 1 run dug in, doesn't get up all that high, rattled through backward square on the pull, straight to the fielder
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run touch straight and Rohit paddles one behind square
Faulkner to S Dhawan, 2 runs back of a length outside off, delicate late cut from Dhawan this time, gets it very fine and they're able to scuttle two as third man runs around to field
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run down the leg side and there's a flick of the pad, Haddin appeals vociferously but correctly not given
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run comes across and punched back on the on side
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs short ball, Rohit hooks off his nose, gets under it but there's enough heft to clear midwicket for a couple
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, 1 run stays back and deflects one from outside off down to third man

Hazlewood to S Dhawan, OUT here comes Shikhar... and there goes Shikhar! He's absolutely skelped this but sends the ball straight into the safe, safe hands of Glenn Maxwell at deep extra cover! Hazlewood roars, clenched fist pumping, they've got their opening. Pitched up outside off, maybe slightly off the toe as Dhawan drove over the infield, only
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run dug in outside off, climbing as the batsman ducks out the way
Johnson to Kohli, no run starts with a short ball, rising towards the rib cage, defended from the crease
Johnson to Kohli, no run slammed in short again, Kohli gets above it and steers towards point
Johnson to Kohli, no run fuller outside off, leans out and steers in front of point, can't get it through the infield
Johnson to Kohli, no run goes short again, over the stumps, hops back into position and defends
Johnson to Kohli, no run pitched up, this is a slower ball, Kohli is on the front foot but mistimes a push back towards mid-off
Johnson to Kohli, 1 run slanted across the right-hander, on a length, opens the face and glides a single to third man
Hazlewood to Kohli, no run Hazlewood metronomes away on a length around off, gets across and defends from the crease
Hazlewood to Kohli, no run this is an excellent display from Hazlewood, gets a bit of extra bounce this time, tempting line and Kohli fends at it, as he is wont to, misses the outside edge
Hazlewood to Kohli, no run straighter, not full enough to get to the pitch, turns it short to the leg side
Hazlewood to Kohli, no run length in the channel outside off, above 142kph and pushed defensively into the covers
Hazlewood to Kohli, no run goodish length outside off and tapped into the off side from the crease again
Hazlewood to Kohli, no run chastity-belt tight from Hazlewood, ducking back on off stump, Kohli defends down the pitch - maiden of the purest variety
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, no run slightly back of a length, drops into the crease and blocks
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run drops short, takes the pace off as well, Rohit wheels around and bottom-edges a pull behind square

Johnson to Kohli, OUT bouncer from Mitch, top-edged and gone - Kohli has cracked! Slow start, quick end for Virat, took on the Johnson short ball and emphatically lost. It was aimed across him, outside off, attempted to pull and sent a lusty blow straight up, Haddin had time to do a little square dance to his left, opened up the gauntlets and swallo
Johnson to Rahane, 1 run starts with a snorting lifter, this eye-balled Rahane from close range, jerks his hands up and does well to fend it away to the leg side for a single
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, no run fuller length in the channel, Rohit leans out and strokes to point, who's on it in a flash
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run shortish, at the body, Rohit stays back and dabs it comfortably behind square for one
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run slightly full of a good length, gets out to meet it but can't to much beyond block towards cover
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, 1 run touch shorter, outside off, stays back and guides one down to third man
Hazlewood to Rahane, no run over the top of off stump, Rahane gets forward and blocks into the covers
Hazlewood to Rahane, no run tight line around off, hops back and across, dabs short towards point
Hazlewood to Rahane, 1 run super ball, slightly back of a length but it spits out of the fire and clatters the handle of Rahane's bat as he fends at it in front of his face
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run fuller now, in the channel, Rohit is hunkering down in the trenches while Hazlewood is on, defends into the covers again
Johnson to Rahane, no run shortish, doesn't get up, Rahane sits on it and blocks down on to the pitch

Johnson to Rahane, 1 run vicious bumper, Johnson is whirring in, aiming at the top of little ole Rahane's block, he flails at it, manages to stab it into the ground past the catcher for a single to get off strike
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run fuller length, pushed across, steered through the covers for one
Johnson to Rahane, 1 run short and angled towards the slips, punched off the back foot through cover, played that better, did Rahane

Johnson to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs short ball and that's a Dorothy for Rohit! Mitch is not going to have it all his own way... Rohit puffs up his chest in response and flat-bats the ball well in front of square, long ball into the crowd

Johnson to Rohit Sharma, OUT bowled him, Johnson strikes back! He leaps up to the skies in celebration, Australia's spearhead has taken out another key batsman, fast and furious, right through Rohit, off the inside edge and lighting up the wicket. Held cross seam, nipped back at pace and clipped the leg bail. Lights are going out for India
Starc to Rahane, no run full and straight, Rahane covers up in defence
Starc to Rahane, no run good, tight line, offering nothing as Rahane gets in line once more
Starc to Rahane, no run back of a length over the stumps, Rahane stays in the crease and defends
Starc to Rahane, no run pushed a little wider, 147kph/91mph and stabbed towards backward point
Starc to Rahane, 2 runs nicely played by Rahane, touch full and he times this back past the bowler and they pick up a couple
Starc to Rahane, 1 run tickles 150 kays, drops back and runs one more behind point
Maxwell to Rahane, no run tossed up outside off stump, gets in line to defend
Maxwell to Rahane, no run angled in, works with the spin to the leg side
Maxwell to Rahane, no run quicker and flatter outside off, touch of spin, played back to the bowler from the crease
Maxwell to Rahane, 1 run drops short and Rahane rocks back to pull, hard and flat but straight to deep backward square
Maxwell to Raina, no run goes around the wicket, pushed through and played towards mid-on, no run
Maxwell to Raina, no run gives this a bit more air, tossed up outside off, Raina reaches for the drive and inside edges past his stumps
Starc to Rahane, no run steams in and bangs out a drumbeat halfway down, Rahane rides the bounce well
Starc to Rahane, no run short again, rising at Rahane's face like a seagull swooping on a stray wotsit, pulls and misses, there's an appeal behind the stumps but no glove involved
Starc to Rahane, 1 run angled across, not so short and steers one through the covers
Starc to Raina, no run good length, veering back in at the batsman, shows it a stout defensive stroke on off

Starc to Raina, no run full length and punched straight back tot he bowler, Starc then tries to throw down the stumps, hits Raina on the pads... Starc appeals for something, Raina thinks about a run. Nothing actually happens
Starc to Raina, 1 wide slung down very short and called wide... Starc follows through to spit some opinions in Raina's direction. Getting a wee bit feisty out there
Starc to Raina, 1 wide fires this well down the leg side, Raina right back on his stumps - another wide
Starc to Raina, no run full and straight, Raina is equal to it once again
Maxwell to Rahane, no run slightly short and outside off, swipes at it and a thick edge falls short of backward point
Maxwell to Rahane, 1 run flat on the stumps, worked away for a single through the leg side
Maxwell to Raina, 1 run goes around the wicket, punched into the covers and there's a misfield, Rahane wanted a second but Raina was dawdling
Maxwell to Rahane, no run angled in with the arm, turned off the pads, can't get it through
Maxwell to Rahane, 1 run tossed up, bounce a touch and swept in the air, lands short of fine leg
Maxwell to Raina, 1 run stays back and works another single off the pads
Faulkner to Raina, no run lands this on a full length outside off, mistimes drive top mid-on from Raina
Faulkner to Raina, 1 run length in the channel, stays in the crease and opens the face, runs one to third man
Faulkner to Rahane, no run sliding across on a length outside off, Rahane punches into the covers off the back foot
Faulkner to Rahane, 1 run tighter to the stumps, waits on it and nurdles one through square leg
Faulkner to Raina, FOUR runs uh oh, Faulkner's copybook picks up another big fat blot, easy pace on a length and Raina whips it off the stumps away through midwicket

Faulkner to Raina, OUT dangles the bat at a short ball, nicks it through to Haddin! India are four down and swaying in the evening breeze! Some redemption for Faulkner, who hit the pitch hard with another cross-seam delivery, got bigger than Raina was expecting, wanted to run it down but just succeeded in steering to the keeper. Soft, squidgy dismis
Maxwell to Rahane, no run pushed through on off stump and played back to the bowler
Maxwell to Rahane, 1 run comes forward and plays back past the bowler
Maxwell to Dhoni, no run on the stumps, flat trajectory, dabbed back to the leg side
Maxwell to Dhoni, 1 run outside off, no turn, Dhoni off the mark with a push through the covers
Maxwell to Rahane, no run pushed through outside off, steered towards the point fielder
Maxwell to Rahane, no run flat and on middle stumps, turned off the pads to the man at square leg
Faulkner to Dhoni, no run good length, in the channel from over the wicket, left alone
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run little bit of width, Dhoni drives airily and gets a thick inside edge behind square on the leg side
Faulkner to Rahane, no run slightly full, around off stump, reaches to drive to mid-off
Faulkner to Rahane, no run tighter line and Rahane drops this down defensively on to the pitch
Faulkner to Rahane, 2 runs on the stumps, stays back and works a coup,e through midwicket
Faulkner to Rahane, 2 runs excellent running again, softly dropped this behind square and hared back for a second as deep midwicket ran around and the throw came in
Maxwell to Dhoni, 1 run tossed up on the stumps, punched down the ground to long-on
Maxwell to Rahane, 1 run flat, with the arm, worked wristily from middle stumps through midwicket for one
Maxwell to Dhoni, 1 run full around off stump, Dhoni shuffles forward and pushes another single down the ground
Maxwell to Rahane, 1 run slightly short outside off, waits on it and chops through cover point
Maxwell to Dhoni, 1 run tossed up a bit further, gets on the front foot, reaches to steers through the covers to the sweeper again
Maxwell to Rahane, 1 run flat on the stumps, Maxwell kicks the turf as Rahane works this back to long-on for another single
Faulkner to Rahane, no run good line around off stump, gets forward to meet it
Faulkner to Rahane, 1 run offers some width, Rahane opens the shoulders and slaps a length ball through the covers

Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run a chance? No, not quite... The camera reeled like a drunk on deck during a storm as Dhoni pulled a short ball, just managed to keep it down as it flew towards Warner patrolling deep square leg
Faulkner to Rahane, 1 run on the stumps, dabs to the leg side and they pinch one more
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run goes back in the crease and gets a thick outside edge wide of the sole slip
Faulkner to Rahane, no run good line on off stump, played back to the bowler
Maxwell to Dhoni, no run on the stumps, tapped back to the bowler
Maxwell to Dhoni, 2 runs makes some room, this was flat outside off and he plays it late, wide of short third man for a couple
Maxwell to Dhoni, 1 run comes forward and pushes through the covers
Maxwell to Rahane, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg, leans out and flicks it around the corner to fine leg
Maxwell to Dhoni, 1 run angled in with the arm and worked away into a gap
Maxwell to Rahane, no run flat on the stumps, Rahane stands tall and punches to Maxwell's right, he skips after it and pounces to prevent a single
Hazlewood to Dhoni, 2 runs starts on a length outside off, Dhoni attempts to helicopter it down the ground, gets a thick outside edge and it flies towards third man, lands safely again
Hazlewood to Dhoni, no run drags it back a touch, plays from the crease towards point
Hazlewood to Dhoni, no run good line on off stump, blocked back down the track
Hazlewood to Dhoni, no run Hazlewood is woodpeckering away outside off, Dhoni tries to force it off the back foot, the ball rolls to cover
Hazlewood to Dhoni, 1 run drops a little short, at the body, pulled into the ground for a single to deep square
Hazlewood to Rahane, no run finishes on the same parsimonious, fourth-stump line he has bowled all night, blocked to point
Watson to Dhoni, 1 leg bye short and rising sharply enough to catch Dhoni off guard, hits the body and drops to the turf, they take a comfortable leg bye
Watson to Rahane, 1 run worked off the pads through midwicket for one
Watson to Dhoni, no run touch short outside off, pushed back into the covers
Watson to Dhoni, no run goes fuller, off-stump line, Dhoni steps out like a guardsman on parade, dead-bats it to mid-off
Watson to Dhoni, 1 run in the channel, shuffles across and flicks the ball away behind point for a single
Watson to Rahane, 2 runs Watson bends his back, the short ball rises at Rahane's grill, he whaps it through backward square with a horizontal bat, easy two there

Hazlewood to Dhoni, FOUR runs smashed down the ground, Dhoni puts a dent in the Hazlewood saloon, slightly full and Dhoni skipped forward to muscle a drive past the umpire, Dharmasena had to bail out there
Hazlewood to Dhoni, 1 run goes shorter, stays on that line outside off, swatted through the covers for one
Hazlewood to Rahane, no run on the stumps, tries to turn off his body, can't get this away
Hazlewood to Rahane, no run angling in off a length, defended into the ground
Hazlewood to Rahane, 1 run straighter line, goes across and whips a single through square
Hazlewood to Dhoni, FOUR runs gets out the carving knife and cuts another slice, this one has some luck about it, shorter length from Hazlewood and slashed on the up over slip for four more
Watson to Rahane, no run Rahane was walking across his stumps, Watson fires it a whisker past leg, batsman misses but the umpire is happy with it
Watson to Rahane, no run fullish, around off stump, check-drive from Rahane, nicely played but straight to mid-off on the bounce
Watson to Rahane, no run cutter from Watson, Rahane pushes into the covers
Watson to Rahane, no run pitched up around off stump, tries to drive but can't get it past mid-on, struggling for timing here
Watson to Rahane, 1 run shorter and Rahane swipes across the line, it's in the air but bounces a fair way short of deep midwicket
Watson to Dhoni, 1 run full length outside off, little bit of width, Dhoni bunts it through the covers along the ground
Johnson to Dhoni, no run starts with a low full toss, quite wide and Dhoni struggles to reach for it, chops to backward point
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run straighter line, working up his pace, turned through a gap at midwicket
Johnson to Rahane, 1 wide sprayed across the right-hander from over the wicket, shapes to play but doesn't pull the trigger - wide
Johnson to Rahane, FOUR runs reaches for the drive and it flies wide of slip, streaky boundary for Rahane, his first of the innings, beaten for pace but he flung the bat hard and got away with it
Johnson to Rahane, no run over the stumps, drops back and plays down the track
Johnson to Rahane, 1 run fullish, slightly leg side, flicked away through backward square with a turn of the wrist, to the man in the deep
Johnson to Dhoni, no run hits the deck, rising above middle and leg stump, Dhoni drops it down on to the pitch and Johnson collects
Watson to Rahane, FOUR runs pitched up and Rahane is on the attack, skips out and lofts this down the ground, a genuine stroke for four this time
Watson to Rahane, no run full and tailing in, comes forward again, this time elects to push back to the bowler
Watson to Rahane, no run short and scrambled, backs away and slashes hard at the ball outside off, misses it completely
Watson to Rahane, 2 runs touch back of a length outside off, plays this deftly off the face of the bat, fine of third man for a couple
Watson to Rahane, 1 run dug in and Rahane hooks wildly, not in control but, because he clothed it, the ball didn't reach fine leg
Watson to Dhoni, 1 run good length on off stump, Dhoni happily chops through point for a single
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run length ball, driven on the up and Dhoni sets off immediately, putting pressure on the man in the covers, they steal a base
Johnson to Rahane, no run clever from Johnson, angled across and just cutting his fingers over it, takes the pace off and Rahane fishes, narrowly avoids feathering it through to Haddin
Johnson to Rahane, 1 run straighter line, works the ball away through square leg
Johnson to Dhoni, no run back of a length, Dhoni pokes it is like an old geezer stoking the fire, hits high on the bat and runs into the covers
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run shortish, gets behind it and drops one more down beside the pitch
Johnson to Rahane, 2 runs fullish outside off, Rahane throws the hands and slices over the infield, behind the man in the deep but Starc runs around and makes a good sliding stop
Faulkner to Dhoni, no run wide of the stumps, maybe a cutter, Dhoni swings leadenly at it, fails to connect
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run goes very full and wide, reaches out and steers a single through the covers
Faulkner to Rahane, no run on the walk, outside off, Faulkner again runs his fingers over it, Rahane dabs and misses
Faulkner to Rahane, 1 run on the stumps, shuffles to off and flicks behind square, the man on the 45 doesn't field it cleanly and they get one
Faulkner to Dhoni, FOUR runs superbly placed, picked the full, wide delivery and sliced it in front of the diving point fielder, the backspin then takes it away from deep cover running around
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run on the stumps, goes deep and works one more to the leg side
Starc to Dhoni, 1 run over the wicket, fullish around off stump, dobbed into the ground towards mid-off, who's back a touch and they take one comfortably

Starc to Rahane, OUT Rahane plays with fire, fiddling at a length ball off the back foot... it slides past the outside edge. No one reacts but Australia then decide to review, not sure on whose prompting. Looks like a gamble, but... While there's no visible deviation, a thin scrape on Snicko is enough for Erasmus, he tells Dharmasena to overturn his

Starc to Jadeja, no run full and homing in on the stumps, maybe sliding too far to leg as it thumps the pad and Dharmasena turns down Starc's appeal. Finch, fielding at short leg, then hits the stumps for good measure but Jadu was home
Starc to Jadeja, 1 run short ball, tries to cut off the back foot, gets a bottom edge behind square
Starc to Dhoni, no run pitched up, punched back to the bowler
Starc to Dhoni, no run full and straight and whipped off the pads, flies along the ground to the fielder on the ring - which is lucky, because fine leg was up
Faulkner to Jadeja, no run nip-backer from Faulkner, this hits Jadeja on the pads, probably a touch high
Faulkner to Jadeja, 1 run over the wicket and at the stumps, worked to the leg side
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run angled across, chopped off the back foot behind point, collected on the move but they still get one
Faulkner to Jadeja, no run slightly short, in the channel outside off, punched into the ground but straight to backward point
Faulkner to Jadeja, 1 run short ball, tries to hook it and gets a bottom edge past the wicket behind square on the leg side
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run slower ball, Dhoni calmly pats it through square on the leg side
Starc to Dhoni, 2 leg byes length, slightly leg side, flicks the pad and runs fine, Dhoni sets off with two in his mind and Watson's lethargic pick up makes sure he will get them
Starc to Dhoni, 1 run stays back, rides the bounce of a back-of-a-length delivery, drops one into the covers
Starc to Jadeja, 1 leg bye zinging back in off a length and Jadeja is beaten on the inside again, thumps the thigh pad and squirts away
Starc to Dhoni, no run pitched up in the channel, driven to the man at cover on the edge of the ring
Starc to Dhoni, 1 run attempted yorker, it's actually a low full toss but Dhoni can only block it into the turf, loops back towards mid-off
Starc to Jadeja, FOUR runs full and fast but reversing down the leg side - would have been a wide if Jadeja had not got some wood on it, runs quickly to the long-leg boundary
Faulkner to Dhoni, no run fullish, outside off, Dhoni cuts and gets a bottom edge into the ground
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run cuts this away from the batsman, in the channel, reaches out and steers a single
Faulkner to Jadeja, no run tight line around off stump, Jadeja shows it a solid straight bat in defence
Faulkner to Jadeja, 1 run back of a length, works this one off his hips, they think about two but won't get the second
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run fullish, another change of pace from Faulkner, crouching walk forwards and pushed to mid-off, one more
Faulkner to Jadeja, 1 run angled in and played with a straight bat into the leg side for another single
Hazlewood to Jadeja, no run angled across the lefty, slightly back of a length, stabbed into the covers and two men converge on it quickly
Hazlewood to Jadeja, 1 run straighter line, stays back and works the ball into the leg side

Hazlewood to Dhoni, 2 runs pulled but it flies high, towards the edge of the ring, but Clarke drops it on the run! A life for Dhoni and how crucial could that be? Big top edge as Hazlewood cramped him for room, Clarke made the ground really well, got his hands under it but allowed it to pop out
Hazlewood to Dhoni, 1 run short again, Dhoni had retained the strike, pulls this flat down towards fine leg
Hazlewood to Jadeja, FOUR runs bit of width, four for Jadeja, stayed back and cut the ball with a rapier flash through point, wide of the third man
Hazlewood to Jadeja, no run goes back and across and defends a length ball - Hazlewood finishes with 1 for 41 from 10. But he'll wish he had Dhoni, too
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run length in the channel and Dhoni spears it through square
Johnson to Jadeja, 1 run wide of the stumps, backs away and chops one more down to third man
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run charges in, this is full and wide of the stumps, throws the bat but mistimes it into the covers, still gets one
Johnson to Jadeja, 1 run continues on a full length, not quite hitting the yorker, this tails on to the pads and Jadeja flicks it to fine leg
Johnson to Ashwin, no run banged in, length in the corridor outside off, slides past the outside edge

Watson to Dhoni, SIX runs full length outside off and this goes, in to the crowd at deep cover! A brutal smear from Dhoni, skipped forwards and cracked it way back over the rope. That's his fifty - the T20 Blood God awakens
Watson to Dhoni, SIX runs six more, down the ground! Watson delivers it in the slot again and Dhoni pounces, huge forearms pumping as he levers another mighty over long-off
Watson to Dhoni, 1 run Watson goes around the wicket, low full toss and miscued into the midwicket area
Watson to Ashwin, no run beaten in the channel, nothing shot from Ashwin, trying to fiddle one to third man, misses
Watson to Ashwin, 1 run short ball from Watto, the batsman was ready, uppercuts to third man, in the air but lands safely and gets Dhoni back on strike
Watson to Dhoni, 1 run very full again, digs it out into the covers for a single
Johnson to Dhoni, no run angled across, Johnson takes the pace off it, chopped into the covers
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run short and clipped off the hips through square
Johnson to Ashwin, 1 run stays in the crease and punches one through a gap in the covers
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run fullish outside off, Dhoni squirts it away through cover point, had gone deep in the crease, another slower ball, I think
Johnson to Ashwin, 1 run good line from Johnson, asking the batsman to take the risk, steered through the covers
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run full and outside off, flicked away in front of point for another single - they've seen off Johnson (2-50) but still need more than 100 from the last six
Starc to Dhoni, no run short delivery, possibly slower and Dhoni pulls hard and fails to connect
Starc to Dhoni, 1 run drops short again, this time regular pace, swings across the line and picks out deep square leg
Starc to Ashwin, (no ball) 1 run Starc unleashes a beamer, wide of the stumps and Ashwin coolly steers it to third man - no-ball called, not a free hit, though

Starc to Dhoni, OUT gone, Dhoni is run out by a direct hit from Maxwell, that's all, folks! Dhoni heads straight off, head bowed, nothing even India's supernatural finisher could do about this. He'd worked the singles hard, flicked this off his legs to midwicket and let probability have a go - Maxwell only had one stump to aim at but he dead-eyed it
Starc to Ashwin, no run back of a length, speared across the batsman, who stays back and fishes unsuccessfully
Starc to Ashwin, no run fired through at nearly 90mph, past the outside edge once again
Starc to Ashwin, 1 run on the stumps, gets in line and pushes one into a gap
Faulkner to Ashwin, no run good length outside off, slightly slower and it slips past the outside edge
Faulkner to Ashwin, no run another cutter in the channel, Ashwin gets back on this one
Faulkner to Ashwin, no run length, outside off, dabs and misses again. Oh dear
Faulkner to Yadav, no run full, too full and Umesh blocks it steadfastly on the front foot
Starc to Shami, 1 run around the wicket, pitched up outside off, edged and it bobbles between keeper and slip, third man cleans up
Starc to Yadav, no run yow, that has clanged Umesh on the helmet grill. No mercy from the Australians, Starc banged it in, rising with lethal intent, deflected off the glove and into his chin
Starc to Yadav, no run short and wide this time, Umesh stays clear
Starc to Yadav, no run
Australia won by 95 runs
Player of the match is Steven Smith, AUS
